Package gobblin.compliance.restore

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RestorableDataset  
    RestorePolicy<T>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdhocRestorePolicy
    A restore policy to restore HivePartitionDataset from a given backup
    ComplianceRestoreJob
    Job for restoring HivePartitionDataset from the backups
    HivePartitionRestorePolicy
    An abstract class for Restore policy for HivePartitionDataset
    LKGRestorePolicy
    Last Known Good (LKG) restore policy
    RestorableHivePartitionDataset
    A Restorable HivePartitionDataset.
    RestorableHivePartitionDatasetFinder
    A finder class for finding Restorable HivePartitionDataset
